title: Glory B Da Funk's On Me!: The Bootsy Collins Anthology / 2CD
description:
The funk - and nothing but the funk.
William "Bootsy" Collins, a major link in the funk evolution, played for James Brown and then docked with George Clinton's Funkadelic / Parliament mothership before stretching his way to a solo career. Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Bootsy Collins AnthologyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ includes several selections from each of Collins' '70s albums, as well as key tracks from the '80s, including the mutation of Bootsy's Rubber Band into the Sweat Band, and with George Clinton producing, of course. A massive, drop-the-bomb set.


Bootsy Collins
